content.c_answer2: Showstopper! The Improvised Musical is 1 hour 30 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 9pm.
content.name: How long is Showstopper! The Improvised Musical and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Showstopper! The Improvised Musical and when does it finish?
